original_text: Joshua called the priests to come to him. He told them, ‘Pick up the Lord's Covenant Box. Seven priests must march in front of it. They must hold seven trumpets, one each.’
korean_text: 눈의 아들 여호수아가 제사장들을 불러 그들에게 이르되 너희는 언약궤를 메고 제사장 일곱은 양각 나팔 일곱을 잡고 여호와의 궤 앞에서 나아가라 하고

sentences.original_text: Joshua called the priests to come to him.
Pick up the Lord's Covenant Box.
Seven priests must march in front of it.
sentences.korean_translation: 일곱 제사장이 그 앞에서 행진해야 한다.
